basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Bacillus circulans JCM 2504T (MIC=5.20 µmol/L), Listeria innocua ATCC 33090 (MIC=1.30 µmol/L), Listeria monocytogenes ATCC BAA-679 (MIC=1.30 µmol/L), Enterococcus faecalis JCM 5803 (MIC=5.20 µmol/L), Lactobacillus plantarum ATCC 14917 (MIC=2.60 µmol/L), Lactobacillus sakei ssp. sakei JCM 1157 (MIC=1.30 µmol/L), Leuconostoc mesenteroides ssp. mesenteroides JCM 6124 (MIC=2.60 µmol/L).
